title: Keep a Low Profile, Sect Leader - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Charismatic Protagonist   Clan Building   Cultivation   Fated Lovers   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Older Love Interests   Reincarnated in a Game World   Reincarnation   Revenge   Sect Development   Strong Love Interests   Sword Wielder   Younger Sisters
author: Kindergarten Expert   幼儿园一把手
description: Traveling to the world of Tian Xuan, can’t believe I’ve become a useless sect’s leader! Paying money in the city to be reborn in a game’s realm. Making the players my workers, collecting the main characters from the world as my underlings. If we’re talking about being pretentious, then I’ll only take the number one spot!>
